welcome.title: Artyr Prydatko
welcome.subtitle: Front-end developer
welcome.description: I'm a Front-End Developer based in Sumy. I love travelling, photography & music.

about.title: About Me
about.description: <0>My name is Artur Prydatko. I have been studying Front-end since September 2019. I like creating a cool project</0><0>The main direction is the development of online stores from scratch, delivery applications, CRM panels for accounting and editing of product items.</0><0>Most of the work I make front-end, but I also make a little back-end for processing requests, working with services.</0>

resume.title: My Resume
resume.resume: <0>I am developing an e-app admin panel for catering establishments. I create and improve online stores for popular chains of pizzerias, rolls, and more. I make applications for the delivery of goods.</0>

0.description: I am developing an e-app admin panel for catering establishments. I create and improve online stores for popular chains of pizzerias, rolls, and more. I make applications for the delivery of goods.

1.description: I was engaged in adding new functionality for the application for the delivery of orders, implementing new features.
